column3: This is waiting for https://github.com/bitcoin-core/secp256k1/pull/607 to be merged upstream.
It has been, though more review of the changes overall would be welcome.
Updated to the latest upstream after merging  bitcoin-core/secp256k1#607.

utACK 99df276 the subtree merge, still need to test the actual changes.

I've written some notes on verifying subtree merges [here](https://github.com/fanquake/core-review/blob/master/subtree-merge.md).

```shell
./contrib/devtools/github-merge.py 15703
[pull/15703/local-merge 12f00cb7a] Merge #15703: Update secp256k1 subtree to latest upstream
 Date: Mon Apr 1 09:09:24 2019 +0800
